name: Shimmering Shield
description: Spin a shield of ice around you, absorbing up to 25609 damage from 3 projectiles.   Each time you absorb a projectile you restore 831 Magicka and gain Major Heroism for 6 seconds, granting you 3 Ultimate every 1.5 seconds.
effectLines: Absorbing projectiles grants you Major Heroism.
coefDescription: Spin a shield of ice around you, absorbing up to $1 damage from 3 projectiles.   Each time you absorb a projectile you restore 831 Magicka and gain Major Heroism for 6 seconds, granting you 3 Ultimate every 1.5 seconds.
